articles.title: First Round of Inter-Korean Premier Talks Opens
Premier Kim Yong Il Leaves for Seoul
articles.content:
Premier Kim Yong Il Leaves for Seoul 
   Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, and his party left Pyongyang Wednesday to participate in the first round of the talks between the premier of the DPRK and the prime minister of south Korea to be held in Seoul.

New Zealand FM Arrives Here

DPRK Government Economic Delegation Leaves for Cuba and Chile 
   Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- A DPRK government economic delegation led by Rim Kyong Man, minister of Foreign Trade, left here Wednesday to visit Cuba and Chile.

articles.title: DPRK Red Cross Society Delegation Leaves for Switzerland
articles.content:
DPRK Red Cross Society Delegation Leaves for Switzerland
   Pyongyang, November 14 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Red Cross Society headed by Paek Yong Ho, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, left here Wednesday to participate in the 16th general assembly of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies and the 30th conference of the International Red Cross to be held in Switzerland.

Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al mandatario palestino
articles.content:
Parten de Pyongyang el premier y su comitiva
   Pyongyang, 14 de noviembre (ATCC) -- Salieron este miercoles de esta capital el premier del Consejo de Ministros, Kim Yong Il, y su comitiva para participar en la primera reunion entre los primeros ministros del Norte y el Sur de Corea, que tendra lugar en Seul.
